title: I Will Early Seek the Saviour
author: F. E. Belden

verses.text:
I will early seek the Saviour,
I will learn of Him each day;
I will follow in His footsteps,
I will walk the narrow way.

I will learn to love my Saviour,
I will learn to love His word;
I will learn to do His bidding,
I will learn to trust my Lord.

I will early seek the Saviour,
In the morning of my days;
I will early seek the Saviour,
I will learn to speak His praise.

chorus.text:
I will early seek that true way,
Early will I seek the Lord;
For He loves me, yes, He loves me,
This is why I love Him so.
